```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(haven)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

#### Create diabetes dataset
```{r}
# clean and tidy data
diabetes_df = analytic |>
  rename(
    glycohemoglobin = lbxgh, 
    insulin_uuml = lbxin, 
    glucose_mgdl = lbxglu
  ) |>
  select(
    seqn, 
    coffee_habit_binary, 
    glycohemoglobin, 
    insulin_uuml, 
    glucose_mgdl
  ) |>
  filter(
    !is.na(glycohemoglobin), 
    !is.na(insulin_uuml), 
    !is.na(glucose_mgdl)
  )
```
